channel.title: ? Item.cfg or Class8 Error

item.title: ? Item.cfg or Class8 Error
item.dc:creator: @_Paranoia †Paranoia†
item.description:
@_Paranoia wrote:

Class8: if(i == 16000) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 350; class8.anInt174 = 5412; class8.anInt181 = 840; class8.anInt190 = 280; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -2; class8.anInt194 = 56; class8.anInt165 = 5409; class8.anInt200 = 5409; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Sheri's Whip"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Sheri ftw".getBytes(); }

Item.cfg item = 16000 Sheri's_Whip Sheri_ftw. 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000 5000

I compile it fine, 0 errors, but when I run it says: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:34)

Read full topic
